Summary: Red lights hovered over Trinity Florida
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in New Port Richey
There was one other sighting in New Port Richey on or around January 19th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving my church at approximately at 9:10 pm after our church band rehersal. I looked up at the west sky and saw several red lights in perfect formation across the sky. The lights were lined up stationary from south to north. I drove home less than three miles away, but did not see the lights from my front yard. I got back in my car and drove back to the church, but the lights were no longer there. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . The red lights were lined up in this formation.
